title: Crazy story you decide the end.
content:
And so the liquid was poured into the ear canal slowly eating away the wax working its way past the ear drum then into the brain.

Now we had the perfect path to the brain but there was another problem how do we get in if we are too big.

We all tried are best to shrink and failed only to grow slightly larger.

Soon we had the money for a tiny robot, a nanomachine to battle the tiny alien threat that was driving him mad.

I fear that only one of us knows enough button combos to battle them like street fighter.

The battle had begun missiles exploding, grappling moves and fighting like I've never seen before then I had a flash back.

Eldridge nedamire came in complaining of a headache after he had eaten a strange rock that fell from the sky but that was then and this is now the battle was going on.


How do you want it to end?
